title: Kings Mountain National Military Park: Volunteer
body: Volunteer       Welcome to Our Volunteers In Parks (VIP) Program The VIP Program at Kings Mountain NMP allows people to step in and lend a helping hand to park staff while providing services that support the park's mission. VIP projects include:  Staffing visitor center information desk Presenting interpretation, education and living history programs General maintenance assistance Assisting with Resource Management projects Maintaining trails  One trailer pad with full hook-ups for personal travel homes is available. Housing is very limited depending on availability and season. If you are interested in volunteering please contact the volunteer coordinator at 864-936-7921. To view more NPS volunteer opportunities, go to www.nps.gov/volunteer or www.volunteer.gov/gov
